{{Infobox battle item |name = Muscle Band |image = [[File:Muscle Band.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Muscle Band''. |price = 1,000 {{battlepoints}} |location =
*[[Muscle Band#Shops|Shops]] }} == Description == The '''Muscle Band''' is a type of held item that can be equipped to any Pokémon. == Details == Increases the Attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 5%. == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Battle Frontier]]|1,000 {{battlepoints}}}} |} |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
